price: 46. L’Heure sera plutôt leur rendez-vous, et l’Heure est plus cruelle encore, et bien plus amère.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bali al-sāʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-sāʿatu adhā wa-amarru
